messages: 61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (23:51): got this question from someone at my presentation, didn't know the answer:
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (23:51): "is it possible to start playing <video> from the middle without loading it from begining to this point?"
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (23:54): 61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19, I don't think that's possible yet, but I recall there was some work being done on that issue
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (23:55): 61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19, there's a thread about that here. http://lists.whatwg.org/pipermail/whatwg-whatwg.org/2009-April/019516.html
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (23:57): I think there were other threads too
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (23:58): Isn't that just up to the user agent?
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (23:58): The spec covers seeking
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (23:59): dashiva: i couldn't even work out the proper events to get the video to play from a specific time
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (23:59): i set the video.currentTime property
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (23:59): but i couldn't seem to do all that at the right time
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (23:59): not sure what the coverage of video API events is
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:00): Many things that could go wrong
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:00): Lack of seeking support in the network, lack of seeking support in the UA, low resolution on the seekable sections, bugs...
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:02): ok, i followed up with them on twitter, and pointed them to the thread lachy gave
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:02): i was surprised by how many good questions there were from the audience
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:02): this was at the Google Developer Day in Moscow
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:03): Is the test page you're using open?
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:03): it was just a local page
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:03): i could publish it if you want to debug it

61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:04): (surprised, only because at other conferences, i've gotten minimal questions. in moscow i couldn't even finish my slides, and we spent another 45 minutes in the hallway answering followup questions. it was awesome)
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:04): Just curious, and not curious enough to create my own test page
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:04): yeah, i think i'm gonna call it a night soon
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:04): i'm not even sure what time it's supposed to be right now
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:04): I'm guessing 2 or 3 am
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:05): i woke up in moscow, now i'm in prague
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:05): no, i think it's closer to midnight
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:05): Then it's just midnight
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:05): did you know they have hotels inside the airport?
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:05): this is the best invention ever
69a015ebfe18fc6dfbd151c0b269ff26 (00:06): The Mark Pilgrim World Tour?
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:07): oh, my trip was trivial compared to some of the google wave guys
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:07): they've been traveling non-stop for over a month
69a015ebfe18fc6dfbd151c0b269ff26 (00:07): Ouch.
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:08): Media elements are probably going to be a huge source of questions in the future as well
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:08): something like 6 countries in 4 weeks
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:08): Considering stuff like a play() algorithm that doesn't have a single step that actually mentions starting to play
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:08): we should all go back to animated gifs
69a015ebfe18fc6dfbd151c0b269ff26 (00:08): http://code.google.com/intl/de/events/developerday/2009/ doesn't look so full.
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:09): 69a015ebfe18fc6dfbd151c0b269ff26: no, there were other events, not just GDD
69a015ebfe18fc6dfbd151c0b269ff26 (00:09): Replacing JPEGs with AJAX.
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:09): trust me, they've been on the Google Wave World Tour
69a015ebfe18fc6dfbd151c0b269ff26 (00:10): Yeah, i just could't found some information on that.
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:15): Aren't there enough people in the know to split up?
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:17): but presenting is a skill. people tend to specialize
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:17): these are relatively high-profile presentations
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:22): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v_UyVmITiYQ has been watched over 6 million times
61831986744b882b4371990cc1863b19 (00:22): or at least started (it's 80 minutes long)
